tddt.catalog.xmlhandler

Interface LoaderInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XMLLoader

    interface LoaderInterface
    This is the interface for the XML Loader. Proper documentation for the methods can be found in the implementing class.

    1.1
    Author:
    Kai Holzinger
